**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 342 4.0 **Traditions** [Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3) **Bloodline** [Shadow](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=14) **Deities** [Charon](/Deities.aspx?ID=135), [Dajermube](/Deities.aspx?ID=235), [Fumeiyoshi](/Deities.aspx?ID=175), [Nhimbaloth](/Deities.aspx?ID=163), [Nhimbaloth](/Deities.aspx?ID=163), [Nyarlathotep (Haunter in the Dark)](/Deities.aspx?ID=222), [Orcus](/Deities.aspx?ID=241), [Treerazer](/Deities.aspx?ID=26) **Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284) **Area** 30-foot line **Saving Throw** Fortitude --- Tendrils of darkness curl out from your fingertips and race through the air. You deal 2d4 negative damage and 1 persistent bleed damage to living creatures in the line. Each living creature in the line must attempt a Fortitude save. **Critical Success** The creature is unaffected.
**Success** The creature takes half the negative damage and no persistent bleed damage.
**Failure** The creature takes full damage.
**Critical Failure** The creature takes double negative damage and double persistent bleed damage. --- **Heightened (+1)** The negative damage increases by 2d4, and the persistent bleed damage increases by 1.
